General.Name: Shanghai Bright Power Semiconductor
General.Description: Shanghai Bright Power Semiconductor Co., Ltd. designs, develops, and sells analog semiconductor power management chips in China. The company offers DC/DC power management chips comprising of multiphase digital controller, intelligent integrated power devices, buck converter POL, and electronic switch/hot swap control products. It also offers AC/DC power management chips, including isolated power and non-isolated power supply. In addition, the company provides LED lighting driver chips, such as non-dimming, dimming, and smart panels. Further, it offers motor control and driver IC related products. The company serves data center, PC, LED lighting, charge adapter, home, and other appliances. Shanghai Bright Power Semiconductor Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: Building 3, Xingchuang Technology Plaza, Shanghai, China
